name: Grand Mountain Adventure (Android)
description:
Grand Mountain Adventure
An Open-world Skiing Adventure Game
Download open-beta at Google Play Store
Grand Mountain Adventure is a skiing game with breathtaking visuals and physics where you venture into massive open-world mountains on a pair of skis.
Compete in different challenges scattered around the mountain to earn ski passes. Use the ski passes to opens up new ski lifts and explore new areas of the mountain.
You can also take a break from the competition and just explore the mountain. Go your own path in the backcountry, throw a backflip down a huge cliff drop, or try to find the secret ski passes that are hidden away from the slopes.
Features
(some are not yet implemented)
Large open world mountains to exploreTravel around the mountains by unlocking ski liftsComplete different challenges (slalom tracks, trick sessions, drop sessions) Find secret items hidden around the mountainsInteract with different game elements (rails, slide on water, push other skiers, escape from bears)Immersive environment (avalanches, wildlife, sunsets, falling rocks and trees)
Game status
We have currently released an open beta and is working full time to have a release ready on android in the beginning of next year. Following the android release we will start working on the ios release. Help us creating a wonderful skiing experience by trying the game out and sharing your thoughts!
For updates and support, follow our Facebook page
For in-game discussions, visit our Reddit forum
We really hope you enjoy it!
/ Toppluva Team
